lst.name: sentence
lst.str: For the historic offering of Conrail shares, Dole visited the New York Stock Exchange and was photographed on the floor wearing a locomotive engineer's cap, which she presented to Stanley Crane, Conrail chairman and chief executive.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Secretary of Transportation, whose department was responsible for the sale of Conrail, noted that Conrail is required to reinvest in its rail system and cannot defer necessary maintenance.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Conrail is in the best position to weather the current tremendous price competition in the transportation industry in general," said Drew Robertson, analyst at Atlantic Systems Inc, a research firm.
